name: SID VICIOUS
description: My first game i created during my time at college. It took about 2 months to make, there is no sound due to the fact that I was far too lazy I had actual sounds recorded just didn't have time to input them in to the final game. The game is called Sid Vicious its based on Sid's adventure where he encounters horrific and terrifying monsters. Collect the gas to espcape.
